name: Second Chance (itch) (gameryashu)
description: ===== Story ===== In the midst of the great war between blue and grey, you decide to enlist for the blue team. Unfortunately, you end up getting hit by an enemy slime ball during your first fight. Your world is no ordinary world though. Everyone gets a second chance... AS A GHOST! BOO! ===== instructions ===== ---- menu ---- --navigate the menu with arrows and space to select --switch level with a/d ---- game ---- --wasd to move --arrows to fire (in that direction) --r to reload --q/e to switch weapons (if you have more than 1) --hold down space to "ghost" (can't be shot but can't shoot) -- Earn 2 stars on a level to pass
